issue.title: [Packaging] Determine whether all the expected artifacts are uploaded
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2724](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2724). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I can imagine the definition of the expected artifacts as follows:

```Java

conda-win:
    platform: win
    template: conda-recipes/appveyor.yml
    artifacts:
      - arrow-cpp-{version}-py35_vc14_0.tar.bz2
      - pyarrow-{version}-py35_vc14_0.tar.bz2
      - ...
```
